img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(45\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f4/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2845%29.png)
Take out the Revenant Charface and Charbone guarding the chest, then open it to collect Fine Gold Thread and a Mind Core.
img_below_text:
Now return and head up the long set of stairs. Clear the area of the Revenant Charface and the Revenant Charbones on either side. When it's safe, go into the small building on the right to pick up the Mount Lingtai Seedlings Soak from the golden turtle.
Mount Lingtai Seedlings

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character stands before a small building with a golden turtle on a table inside. This area is part of a quest where players must defeat Revenant Charface and Charbone enemies to access valuable items, including Fine Gold Thread and a Mind Core from a chest. The image serves as a visual guide for players to locate the building where they can collect the Mount Lingtai Seedlings Soak from the golden turtle, advancing their progress in the game.
